intro: Sisymbrium irio var. transtaganum, commonly known as the yellow rocket, is a flowering plant belonging to the Brassicaceae family. It is characterized by its bright yellow flowers and pinnately lobed leaves. The plant is native to Europe and parts of Asia but has been introduced to other regions. It typically grows in disturbed soils and can thrive in a variety of habitats, including roadsides and fields. The seeds are small and capsule-like, dispersing easily by wind.
